title: Maintenance Fund‖ to be utilised by the Co-operative Housing Society of the allottees of such Building, as per the guidelines framed by the Corporation
clause_text: Maintenance Fund‖ to be utilised by the Co-operative Housing Society of the allottees of such Building, as per the guidelines framed by the Corporation. In addition, the Commissioner shall cause to be deposited 25% of the amount of consideration received from the allottees of each and every rehabilitation and relocation in URC building, in another Maintenance Fund called
section: Formation of Co-operative Housing Societies, and their Federations for buildings in URS -
